task.title: Account Detail - General
task.shortdesc: This page allows you to view, delete the IAM account, as well as creating and applying access policies and permissions associated with that account.

task.title: General Tab
task.shortdesc: The General tab displays the name of the account, the ID assigned to the account, users and groups in the account, and roles defined for the account, if any.

task.title: Actions menu
task.shortdesc: Clicking the gear icon from the Actions menu allows you to delete the account.

step.cmd: Click the Actions menu and select Delete account.
When the confirmation dialog box displays, click the Yes, Delete Account button to confirm the deletion. Otherwise, close the confirmation dialog box to cancel.

taskbody.context: On accounts, you can only apply "Deny" policies that disallow users of the particular account from performing certain functions.

step.cmd: Click the Add Access Policy button to open a policy editor window in order to edit each policy defined. For more information, go to IAM Identifiers. Refer to the Help in the Access Policy window for additional instructions.
If policies are defined and listed, click the View/edit icon (a pencil) next to the policy to view or edit that policy.

taskbody.context: To delete a denial policy from an account:

step.cmd: Click on the Remove policy icon (a minus sign in a circle) next to a policy to delete that policy.
When the confirmation dialog box displays, click the Yes, Delete button to confirm the deletion. Otherwise, close the confirmation dialog box to cancel.
